title: Developer Protfolio
description: personal portfolio website designed to present my profile, skills, education, and projects in a simple and professional layout. The site focuses on clean design and clear content to create an effective online presence as a front-end developer.
challenges: Making the layout clean and responsive without using JavaScript.
future: Adding interactive elements, improving mobile responsiveness, and integrating a functional contact form.

title: Fitness Application
description: A fitness-themed landing page showcasing workout plans, pricing, BMI calculator information, and fitness goals with a clean and structured layout.
challenges: Ensuring consistent section styling and layout using only HTML and CSS.
future: Adding interactivity (such as functional BMI calculator and navigation) and improving mobile responsiveness.

title: Architect Website
description: A creative interior design landing page showcasing architecture-style visuals, service sections, a portfolio grid, customer reviews, and a contact section in a modern layout.
challenges: Organizing multiple content sections and layouts using only HTML and CSS.
future: Adding animations, enhancing responsiveness for all screen sizes, and integrating a working contact form.

title: Bike Zone
description: A motorcycle-themed landing page featuring product showcases, latest news sections, an FAQ accordion, and customer testimonial visuals with a modern Bootstrap-based layout.
challenges: structuring multiple sections and maintaining a consistent design using Bootstrap’s grid system and components.
future: Adding interactive JavaScript features (e.g., dynamic sliders and form validation) and improving responsiveness on all devices.

title: Donate Bangladesh
description: A donation website UI that displays donation causes and allows users to interact with donation-related content, including simple on‑page calculations using JavaScript.
challenges: Implementing donation logic and structuring multiple content sections using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
future: Enhancing interactivity further, improving mobile responsiveness, and adding backend integration for real donation processing.

title: My-Eleven
description: A sports team management app where users claim credits to 'buy' players. Features a dynamic balance system, a player selection limit (6 players), and a toggleable view between available and selected players.
challenges: Implementing strict validation logic to prevent duplicate selections and managing team size limits dynamically.
future: Adding smooth scroll-triggered animations, refining the mobile layout for better touch-target accuracy, and integrating a backend to save user-created teams.

title: Gadget-Heaven
techStack: React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, React Router DOM
description: feature-rich e-commerce platform called 'Gadget Heaven' that allows users to browse tech products by category, view detailed product specifications, and manage both a shopping cart and a wishlist.
challenges: Managing complex application states to ensure the cart and wishlist counts update accurately across different routes while preventing duplicate entries in the wishlist.
future: Enhancing interactivity further, improving mobile responsiveness, and adding backend integration for real-time inventory management and payment processing.

title: Eco-Adventure Experiences
techStack: React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Firebase Authentication, React Router DOM, Animate.css / AOS (Animation libraries).
description: An 'Eco-Adventure' tourism platform that showcases sustainable travel experiences like mountain treks, forest safaris, and ocean dives. The site features secure user authentication (Google/Email), a detailed adventure guide, and an interactive 'Talk to Expert' consultation system.
challenges: Managing complex state for the food cart.
future: Implementing secure private routes that redirect unauthenticated users to the login page and managing complex dynamic routing to display specific details for each adventure category.

title: BistroBoss
techStack: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB (MERN Stack), Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Stripe.
description: A professional restaurant management and e-commerce platform that allows users to browse food categories, add items to a cart, and make secure online payments. It includes a dedicated admin dashboard for managing menus, monitoring revenue, and handling user roles.
challenges: Implementing role-based access control (Admin vs. User) and securing private API routes using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) to ensure data privacy and safe financial transactions.
future: Enhancing interactivity further, improving mobile responsiveness, and adding backend integration for real-time table booking and a customer review system.
